_header: Harkeneth all the right way / What Saint Luke here will say
_description: Gospel for Tuesday after Easter, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
HErkneþ alle þe rihte wayWhat seint Luc here wol
                    say…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And þat so mote alle weSiggeþ Amen par
                    Charite
